data.title: dumping measures applicable to imports of trichloroisocyanuric acid (TCCA) from China, published in OJ
data.meta_description: The Commission has opened an investigation (a ‘partial interim review’) of the anti-dumping measures on trichloroisocyanuric acid (TCCA) imports from China. This review was requested by ERCROS S.A. and …
data.text:
The Commission has opened an investigation (a ‘partial interim review’) of the anti-dumping measures on trichloroisocyanuric acid (TCCA) imports from China. This review was requested by ERCROS S.A. and Electroquímica de Hernani S.A. on behalf of the EU TCCA industry..

The review concerns TCCA, also known as symclosene, which falls under specific CN and TARIC codes. Current anti-dumping measures are enforced by Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/2757.

The request is backed by evidence indicating significant changes in the Chinese TCCA industry's structure, such as increased production capacity and overcapacity, leading to lower export prices. Since the original investigation, the number of Chinese exporters and the
